sentences.en: Attlee was extremely intelligent and his grasp of the situation was masterly.
sentences.cn: 阿特利聪明过人，对局势的把握颇为高明。

sentences.en: Earthquakes are extremely difficult to predict.
He was a stern critic but an extremely kindly man.
sentences.cn: 他是个苛刻的批评家，但却是个非常善良的人。

sentences.en: He was extremely devious in his efforts to achieve his heart's desire.
sentences.cn: 他在设法得到自己的中意之物时会不择手段。

sentences.en: His best friend was killed by police under extremely questionable circumstances.
sentences.cn: 他最好的朋友在极其可疑的情况下被警察打死了。

sentences.en: His main problem was the extremely smoky atmosphere at work.
sentences.cn: 他面临的主要问题就是：工作场所总是烟雾弥漫。

sentences.en: I’m extremely sorry to have troubled you.
sentences.cn: 给你添了麻烦，我十分抱歉。

sentences.en: It was extremely hot and I was feeling rather randy.
sentences.cn: 场面非常刺激撩人，我感到欲火难耐。

sentences.en: Mr Brooke is an extremely affable and approachable man.
sentences.cn: 布鲁克先生极为谦和，平易近人。

sentences.en: My mobile phone is extremely useful.
Only the extremely rich could afford to lunch at the Mirabelle.
sentences.cn: 只有非常有钱的人才能在米拉贝勒餐厅吃得起午餐。

sentences.en: Rolls Royce produces around 1,000 extremely desirable cars a year.
sentences.cn: 劳斯莱斯公司每年生产约1,000辆非常吸引人的汽车。

sentences.en: She has a huge army of young fans, and is extremely talented.
sentences.cn: 她拥有一大批年轻的崇拜者，而且她极具天赋。

sentences.en: Thank you very much indeed, Doctor, I am extremely obliged to you.
sentences.cn: 大夫，太感谢您了，您真是我的大恩人。

sentences.en: The chairs were light in construction yet extremely strong.
sentences.cn: 这些椅子构造轻巧，但却极为结实。

sentences.en: The family are rich, and extremely sophisticated and cosmopolitan.
sentences.cn: 这家人很富有，老于世故，而且见多识广。

sentences.en: This tree is always recognizable by its extremely beautiful silvery bark.
sentences.cn: 这种树很容易辨认，因为它有着非常漂亮的银色树皮。

sentences.en: Three of them are working extremely well.
sentences.cn: 他们中的3个人工作极其出色。

sentences.en: Twelve extremely good-looking, smooth young men have been picked as finalists.
sentences.cn: 12名特别漂亮精明的青年男子被选为参加决赛的选手。

words.tran_cn: 极端的；极度的；偏激的；尽头的
极端；末端；最大程度；极端的事物
极端主义（尤指政治上的极右或极左）；极端性；过激主义
极端；绝境；非常手段；手足

trans.tran_en: You use extremely in front of adjectives and adverbs to emphasize that the specified quality is present to a very great degree
